Title: Proof that there exist only 17 Wallpaper Groups (Tilings of the plane)
Content: I had a professor who once introduced us to Wallpaper Groups. There are many references that exist to understand what they are (example Wiki, Wallpaper group ). The punchline is $$There \,\, are \,\, exactly \,\, 17 \,\, wallpaper \,\, groups \,\,(17 \,\, ways \,\, to \,\, tile \,\, the \,\, plane)$$ My question is $2$ -fold: Can someone sketch out the proof or at least give some high level ideas of why this may be true? Can someone refer me to a website or a textbook that develops the proof in detail?
